comedTavernDanielText: Welcome to the ComEd Town Hall, where you can chat about work or ask questions!
comedTavernChatPlaceHolder: Type a message to your coworkers!
backgroundComEd5Notes: A figure bearing the ComEd star.
comedHeadMystery201611Desc: Celebrate ComEd's initiatives just like Anne P. in this fancy hat.
comedHeadArmoireRedHaribowDesc: Amp up your everyday style in radiant red.
comedHeadArmoireMinerHelmetNotes: Shine some light and protect your head!
comedHeadSpecialFallRogueNotes: Show your ComEd Pride in this stylish red hoodie.
comedHeadSpecialFall2015MageNotes: You can turn on the magic to help customer's have a premier experience with ComEd. Show off your Customer Service Wizardry with this sorcerous hat.
comedArmorSpecialFall2015MageNotes: You can turn on the magic to help customer's have a premier experience with ComEd. Show off your Customer Service Wizardry with these sorcerous robes.
comedArmorArmoireRedPartyDressNotes: Celebrate ComEd's initiatives just like Anne P. in this fancy dress.
comedHeadSpecialNyeNotes: Happy Birthday! Wear this hat and you'll be getting sung to every 3 minutes on your special day.
bodySpecialSummer2015RogueNotes: Keep all your safety gear close with this belt.
comedArmorMystery201609Notes: Fit in with the rest of the herd in this snuggly armor!
comedShieldSpecialSummer2016HealerNotes: Let your fandom shine on May 4th for galactic battles and short green mentors with this star.
comedShieldArmoireFloralBouquetNotes: Who doesn't love a nice bouquet of flowers?
comedHeadSpecialWinter2016WarriorNotes: Entertain your co-workers in this hat, just don't sing that song!
comedArmorRogue1Notes: Dress like a ComEd lineman to learn how to work safely and efficiently.
comedHeadArmoireRedFloppyHatNotes: A simple hat, in radiant ComEd Red
comedHeadArmoireGraduateCapNotes: Congrats! Your knowledge about energy basics and management have earned you this thinking cap!
